appearances.title: House Democrats Hold News Conference After Passage of ACA Tax Credits : CSPAN2 : January 8, 2026 5:31pm-5:48pm EST
appearances.snippet: i'm thankful for the leadership of pete aguilar frank pallone and every single house democrats including lauren underwood who's been a steadfast leader and supporter of the affordable care act tax credits. which are all about protecting the health care working-class americans, middle-class americans in every day americans. that's what house democrats will always be about. i'm thankful for the leadership of senator chuck schumer and every single senate democrat who in december supported legislation for a straightforward three-year extension of the affordable care act tax credit and we know that legislation has the majority of support in the united states senate right now. every single senate democrat at least four senate republicans. john thune needs to bring the bill up for a vote immediately and stop playing procedural games. they are jeopardizing the health and safety and well-being of the american people. it's now my honor to you to whip catherine clarke. >> thank you so much mr. leader and topping off my list of gratitude is to you and for your incredible leadership and strength and
